downloadDescription: Use this infographic as-is or customize it for your organization. Display this infographic on your website to show clients and customers how to use your virtual appointments.
detailsSection: This is an infographic about virtual appointments that you can use as-is or customize to suit your organization. Use this infographic to show your clients and customers how to use virtual appointments with your organization.
systemRequirementsSection: Ability to view PDF and PowerPoint presentations
installInstructionSection:
1. Select the Download button to start the download.
  2. The download should start automatically. If prompted, select Save or Save this program to disk.
  3. Select Open file, or find the file on your device and open it.
  4. Customize the infographic if needed.
  5. Share with your clients and customers.
